title: Tech Mahindra Q1 profit up 23% to Rs 851 crore, revenue down
description: IT services company Tech Mahindra on Thursday reported 23% year-on-year (YoY) growth in its consolidated net profit at Rs 851 crore in the June quarter. The profit was slightly below the Street estimate of Rs 870 crore.
content: Tech Mahindra, the country's fifth largest IT services firm, posted a 23% year-on-year increase in first-quarter net profit, driven by healthy margins and segmental growth.
cleaned_content: tech mahindra the countrys fifth largest it services firm posted a <TWO_TEN_PERCENT> year on year increase in first quarter net profit driven by healthy margins and segmental growth
